message.verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent to your email address.
message.pleaseCheckYourEmail: Please check your email inbox and follow the instructions in the email to activate your account.
message.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists.
message.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
message.passwordMustBeBetween: Password must be between {{ min }} to {{ max }} characters.
message.accountNotActivated: This account has not been activated yet.
message.ifYouNotReceiveEmail: If you haven't received the verification email in 10 minutes, you can click the button below to resend the verification email.
message.tooManyRetries: You have entered the invalid email or password too many times. Please try again later.
message.invitationEmail: Enter friend's email to send the invitation.
message.clickingSignupToAgreePolicy: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.
message.sendPostCaptureAlert: After this Capture is sent, the ownership will be transferred to the selected friend. Are you sure?
message.transactionExpired: A Capture you sent is returned.
message.syncingAssets: Syncing of your Captures is in progress, this might take a few minutes. Please keep the app open and connected online.
message.allPhotosRegistered: All Captures registered on blockchain successfully
message.confirmPrefetch: Do you want to restore the registered Captures? It may take minutes to complete.
message.doNotTurnOffApp: Please keep the screen on and DO NOT leave the app.
message.confirmLogout: Your local data will be wipe out after logout. You can restore your Captures after login again.
message.resetPasswordEnterEmail: To reset the password, you have to enter your registered email.
message.resetPasswordEmailSent: An email has been sent to your registered email inbox. To reset your password, please click the link in the email.

error.loginTimeoutError: Connection timeout. Please try again later.
error.loginHttpResponseError: The email address or password you entered is invalid.
error.loginUserNotActiveError: Account is not active. Please activate the account from the activation email you received.
error.loginUnkownError: Unknown error. Please try again later.
error.locationPermissionDenied: Location permission is denied. Please turn your location permission on to enable the full feature of Capture app.
error.locationPositionUnavailable: Location is not available at this Capture; possibly due to weak network connectivity or GPS signals.
error.locationTimeout: Location collection timeout, possibly due to weak network connectivity or GPS signals.
error.locationUnknownError: Location is not available at this Capture; possibly due to permission error, weak network connectivity or GPS signals.
error.prefetchError: Photo restore does not complete due to bad network connections. It will continue when you re-open the app next time.
